com.communote.server.persistence.user.client

Class ClientHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.persistence.user.client.ClientHelper

  • public final class ClientHelper
extends Object
    The Class ClientHelper contains helper methods for the client id management.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_GLOBAL_CLIENT_ID
      The Constant DEFAULT_GLOBAL_CLIENT_ID defines the default id for the global client.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_GLOBAL_CLIENT_ID

        public static final String DEFAULT_GLOBAL_CLIENT_ID
        The Constant DEFAULT_GLOBAL_CLIENT_ID defines the default id for the global client.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • assertIsCurrentClientGlobal

        public static void assertIsCurrentClientGlobal()
                                        throws AuthorizationException
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current client is not the global client.

      • createUniqueClientId

        public static String createUniqueClientId()
        Creates a (worldwide) unique ID to be used as unique identifier for a client.
        Returns:
        the unique client ID

      • getClient

        public static ClientTO getClient(String clientId)
        Get the details of a client that has the given ID.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the ID of the client
        Returns:
        the client details or null if the application is not initialized, the clientId was null or the client does not exist

      • getCreationDate

        public static Timestamp getCreationDate()
        Returns:
        Timestamp of the creation date of the current client.

      • getCurrentClient

        public static ClientTO getCurrentClient()
        Get the client that is associated with the current thread. If there is no client bound to the thread and the application is initialized, that is CommunoteRuntime#isInitialized() returns true, the global client will be returned. Otherwise null is returned.
        Returns:
        the current client, or null if no client is bound to this thread and the application is not initialized

      • getCurrentClientId

        public static String getCurrentClientId()
        Get the ID of the client which is associated with the current thread. If no client is associated with the current thread the ID of the global client is returned. The latter will lead to an exception if called before the start of the Communote runtime.
        Returns:
        the ID of the current client

      • getDefaultLanguage

        public static Locale getDefaultLanguage()
        Return the default language defined in the client configuration properties
        Returns:
        default locale

      • getGlobalClientId

        public static String getGlobalClientId()
        Return the ID of the global client. An exception will be thrown if called before the start of the Communote runtime.
        Returns:
        the ID of the global client

      • isClientGlobal

        public static boolean isClientGlobal(ClientTO client)
        Checks if the given client is the global client.
        Parameters:
        client - the client. Can be null.
        Returns:
        true if the client is the global client or the argument was null

      • isClientGlobal

        public static boolean isClientGlobal(String clientId)
        Checks if the given ID is the ID of the global client
        Parameters:
        clientId - the ID of the client to test. Can be null.
        Returns:
        true if the ID belongs to the global client or the argument was null

      • isCurrentClientGlobal

        public static boolean isCurrentClientGlobal()
        Checks if the current client is global.
        Returns:
        true, if the current client is global
